title: This is a Bug? Or is my problem? For torch.index_select()
body_html:
I used the function, torch.index_select(), to do something. But always have some problem.
the error:
conv_rs_sub1 = tr.index_select(conv_rs_single, 2, sub1_index)
RuntimeError: index_select(): argument 'index' (position 2) must be Variable, not torch.LongTensor

my sub code:
sub1_index = tr.from_numpy(np.arange(0, candi_index, step=1)).type(tr.LongTensor)
conv_rs_sub1 = tr.index_select(conv_rs_single, 2, sub1_index)

the conv_rs_single size is (1, 1, 30, 220)

Please help me .

body:
I used the function, torch.index_select(), to do something. But always have some problem. 
the error:
    conv_rs_sub1 = tr.index_select(conv_rs_single, 2, sub1_index)
RuntimeError: index_select(): argument 'index' (position 2) must be Variable, not torch.LongTensor

my sub code:
sub1_index = tr.from_numpy(np.arange(0, candi_index, step=1)).type(tr.LongTensor)
conv_rs_sub1 = tr.index_select(conv_rs_single, 2, sub1_index)

the conv_rs_single size is (1, 1, 30, 220)

Please help me .
